pyfunc.placeholder module¶

class pyfunc.placeholder.Placeholder(func: Callable[[Any], Any] | None = None, op_func: Callable[[Any, Any], Any] | None = None, other_operand: Any | None = None, is_reverse: bool = False)[source]¶

Bases: object

A placeholder object that creates callable expressions for an elegant pipeline syntax. This class is now a pure “recipe builder”. The Pipeline class is responsible for “unwrapping” the recipe into an executable function.

as_reducer() → Callable[[Any, Any], Any][source]¶

Returns a two-argument function suitable for reduce operations.

PyFunc
